objective.name: OBJ_IntroTalk
objective.title: Report to Mr. Jefferson
objective.description: Tell Mr. Jefferson you finished your cleaning duty

objective.name: OBJ_IntroCollectTrash
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Collect all the garbage left in the classroom

objective.name: OBJ_JeffersonFirstPicBring
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Bring the picture to Mr. Jefferson

objective.name: OBJ_JeffersonFirstPicTake
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Take a picture of a girl for Mr. Jefferson

objective.name: OBJ_KateHelpLockerFindKey
objective.title: <color=cyan>Help Kate:</color> Find a locker master key somewhere in the hallway

objective.name: OBJ_KateHelpLockerOpenLocker
objective.title: <color=cyan>Help Kate:</color> Giver her the key you found

objective.name: OBJ_BrookeMemoryCard01
objective.title: <color=cyan>The Memory Card:</color> Find a way to lead the principal out of his office

objective.name: OBJ_BrookeMemoryCard02
objective.title: <color=cyan>The Memory Card:</color> Give the memory card back to Brooke

objective.name: OBJ_PrincipalPrank
objective.title: <color=cyan>Principal Prank</color> Go to the Principal's office door to start a diversion procedure or ask someone smart to help you with it

objective.name: OBJ_BrookeDeepFakeBrookeWaitsInRestroom
objective.title: <color=cyan>Deep Fake:</color> Brooke is waiting at the girls restroom to record the video

objective.name: OBJ_BrookeDeepFakeCheckGirlsRestroom
objective.title: <color=cyan>Deep Fake:</color> Check if the girls restroom is available for a private recording session

objective.name: OBJ_BrookeDeepFakeReportToBrooke
objective.title: <color=cyan>Deep Fake:</color> Tell Brooke the girl's restroom is empty

objective.name: OBJ_CleanGirlsRestroom
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Clean the girl's room

objective.name: OBJ_CleanGirlsRestroomReport
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Report to Samuel

objective.name: OBJ_TalkToSamuel
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Find Samuel and ask him about your new 'job'

objective.name: OBJ_TalkToThePrincipal
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Find the principal and have a chat with him

objective.name: OBJ_TaylorOutOfGirlsRoomDoor
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Find a way to make Taylor leave the door
objective.description: Try Smooth Talking her, of find and give her Courtney's bracelet lost somewhere in the main hall

objective.name: OBJ_GoToDorm
objective.title: <color=cyan>Task:</color> Rest at your room in the boys dorm

objective.name: OBJ_ChloeSearchNathanRoom01
objective.title: <color=cyan>Turf War:</color> Search Nathan's room
objective.description: Find a way into Nathan Prescott's room in the boys dorm and search for any compromising evidence against him

objective.name: OBJ_WarrenMainObjective
objective.title: <color=cyan>The White Knight Quest</color>
objective.description: Warren asked your help to win Max's heart... You can do it for a reward, or sabotage him... Maybe both?
